title: 3115 white screen
message:
This board power with chime and TB image is OK.
But on LVDS screen no video, white screen.

I checked and L9004 was bad. I replaced it and no no white screen anymore. Now dark screen but no video, no backlight. If I remove L9404 I have white screen again.
LCDVDD, LCD_F, CLK and DATA are at 3.3V
LCDBKL - 25V

I tested this screen on working board and screen is ok.
LVDS connector from pin8 to pin 18 compared with another board I have same value 5M en all data pins.

Any idea what to check next?

title: 3115 white screen
message: Measure all LVDS lines on diode mode. Check if L9080 is not damaged. Also installing L9004 should not affect backlight...

title: 3115 white screen
message:
All LVDS compared with another board are the same. L9080 is OK.
What is next? PCH?

title: 3115 white screen
message: What does OK mean? I ask for a diode mode measurement!

title: 3115 white screen
message: Seems ok. As I said instilling L9004 should not affect the backlight, check again.

title: 3115 white screen
message: It is not affecting the backlight. Just wthout L9004 I have only backlight, and after installing L9004 I think I still have backlight but TFT is already powered and I see dark screen.

title: 3115 white screen
message:
You think you have backlight? Is it hard to see the Apple logo lighting up?

Inspect connector for damage. Measure all LVDS lines at the end of a known good LCD cable. Also check if power after L9004 is 3.3V and not too low.
